chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: The smoke detector was sent instead of the ordered goods. Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The customer claims that the parcel was delivered empty (The package had a Smoke detector instead of an iPhone 13 Pro)(see pictures in the details). We have requested the BM certificate of non-receipt, pictures of the package, picture of the label with tracking number visible, pictures of the package inside (with the product received inside if any) and police report.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

Best regards,

Paulo - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this issue and will inform our logistcis partner. In the meantime, please assist the customer in filling up a valid CND as the IMEI is missing. Please also ask the customer to keep the parcel as the courier may require it for investigations.

Can I also clarify if the customer wrote any comments on the delivery note? 

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

picture is free.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The CND provided by the customer is not valid as the IMEI of the device is missing. Please assist the customer to add the IMEI:356942287272168 in the CND and send us again.  Please also ask the customer to keep the parcel as the courier may require it for investigations.

Kindly inform us if the customer wrote any comments on the delivery note as well.

Thank you.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

here the document.


Kind Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for submitting the relevant documents. We will keep you updated.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

The carrier seemed to have issues accessing the parcel to continue their investigation, could you kindly request the customer to contact the courier directly? I have attached the letter from the courier regarding this issue. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Olga Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Did the customer contact the courier?

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

Customer says:" I have tried to contact UPS. After several phone calls, I received the following e-mail.

"Dear Mr Hollen,

Thank you for your enquiry.

We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

I have checked the parcel. Unfortunately, the parcel has not been scanned since 28/05/24. We will be happy to investigate this matter.

Please complete the attached file and send it to us.

In order to start the investigation, we also need the contact details of the recipient and sender, e.g. e-mail and telephone number.

The response to the enquiry can take up to 10 working days. Only then does the claim process begin.

Thank you for your efforts. Please also attach the original text of your message to the reply.

If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.


Yours sincerely



Shpresa Uka
UPS Customer Resolution Group"

I have replied to the e-mail with the requested form.

I am currently waiting for a reply."


Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

So please, refund the customer.

Regards,
Olga from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner has informed us that the claim was refused as the customer did not want to give the parcel to UPS’s driver.


Here is the carrier answer :

“ Our tracking system indicates that the UPS driver attempted to pick up the damaged merchandise/original box on 05/31/2024 but the recipient refused to give it to him. 

The damage investigation was canceled."

Can we check why the customer did not give the parcel to UPS? On 30/5 we had already informed the customer to keep the parcel as the carrier needed to collect it for investigation purposes.

Regards,
RK

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

 This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Celia-Cristina - Back Market
